articles.description: JK Paper share price has been on an uptrend since July, breaking above the 200-Day MA resistance at ₹374. 21-Day MA is close to crossing 100-Day MA, strengthening the bullish case. Immediate support at ₹374, next at ₹370. Traders can go long at ₹375, stop-los…
articles.content: The share price of JK Paper has been in a strong uptrend since July this year. The stock rose about 4.3 per cent on Thursday breaking above the 200-Day Moving Average (MA) resistance level at 374. Th… [+647 chars]

articles.author: ET Bureau
articles.title: HDFC Bank launches new credit card with Marriott - The Economic Times
articles.description: The bank aims to cash in on 'revenge spending' by customers on travel by launching this credit card, said Parag Rao, head of digital payments at HDFC Bank.
articles.content: Mumbai: HDFC Bank on Thursday launched a new credit card in partnership with international hotel chain Marriott to capitalise on the soaring domestic and global travel by Indians and gain market shar… [+931 chars]

articles.author: Anwesha Mitra
articles.title: SBI Chairman Dinesh Khara to receive 10-month extension: Report | Mint - Mint
articles.description: SBI Chairman Dinesh Khara may stay for 10 more months, while SBI MD Ashwini Kumar Tewari may get a 2-year extension.

articles.author: PTI
articles.title: Quinag exits Manappuram Finance; sells entire stake for Rs 1,177 crore - The Economic Times
articles.description: According to the bulk deal data available with the BSE, Quinag Acquisition (FPI) disposed of 8,37,85,880 shares amounting to a 9.90 per cent stake in Manappuram Finance. The shares were offloaded at an average price of Rs 140.50 apiece, taking the transaction…
articles.content: Foreign fund house Quinag Acquisition on Thursday offloaded its entire stake in Manappuram Finance for Rs 1,177 crore through an open market transaction. According to the bulk deal data available wit… [+1801 chars]
